title: Countries with the largest Jewish population in 2010
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Estimated Jewish population in thousand in the y axis.
The Estimated Jewish population in thousand is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Austria.
The lowest value at Country Austria is 569.0x times less than the highest value at United States.
